name: app/components/app.js
App
description:
Entry point for the view layer of the app

Renders:
Info component
Hand (dealer) component
Hand (player) component
Control component (buttons)

name: constructor
description: Constructor

name: onDeal
description:
Handle deal new cards event (new round).
Deals cards to player and dealer.
Sets application state to update the app view.

name: onHit
description: Handle player's new hit event.

name: onStand
description:
Handles player's stand event (round finished).
Dealers hits here - view layer does not know
anything about the logic.
Determines the winner
Updates the view

name: clearTimeout
description: Clear timeout if defined

name: componentWillUnmount
description:
Clear timeout when component unmounts.
This is not necessary for this app because
this component will only umnount when the
browser tab/window is closed, but still
it is good to clean-up

name: render
description: Render the app component.

name: app/components/card.js
Card
description: Card component.

name: app/components/controls.js
content:
import React, { PropTypes } from 'react'; import CSSTransitionGroup from 'react-addons-css-transition-group'; /** * Control component * * Renders: * deal button * hit button * stand button * * @return {ReactElement} markup */ /** * Control component where player controls how to play the game. * * @class Controls (name) * @param {Object} props Component properties * @param {Bool} props.dealDisabled Should deal button be disabled * @param {Function} props.deal Run when Deal button is clicked * @param {Function} props.hit Run when Hit button is clicked * @param {Function} props.stand Run when Stand button is clicked * @return {ReactElement} markup */ const Controls = ({ dealDisabled, deal, hit, stand }) => { return (
{ !dealDisabled &&
} { dealDisabled &&
}
); } /** * Defines property types for this component. */ Controls.propTypes = { dealDisabled: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, deal: PropTypes.func.isRequired, hit: PropTypes.func.isRequired, stand: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; export default Controls;

name: Controls
description: Control component where player controls how to play the game.

params.name: props.deal
params.description: Run when Deal button is clicked

params.name: props.hit
params.description: Run when Hit button is clicked

params.name: props.stand
params.description: Run when Stand button is clicked

name: app/components/hand.js
Hand
description: Hand component where dealt cards are rendered.

name: app/components/info.js
Info
description: Info component where game info is rendered.

name: app/game/deck.js
createDeck
description:
Creates a deck.
Private function used by Deck.

name: _deck
description:
Deck of cards store.
Private variable used by Deck.

name: Deck
description:
Create a new Deck.
Privately stores deck of cards
using WeakMap.

name: create
description: Create the deck of cards and shuffle

name: shuffle
description: Shuffle the deck of cards

name: length
description: Get the amount of remaning cards

name: deal
description: Deal the last card from the deck

name: app/game/hand.js
calculateScore
description: Calculates the detailed score (soft and hard total).

name: calculateTotal
description: Calculates the hand total score.

name: _hand
description:
Hand of cards store.
Private variable used by Hand.

name: _stats
description:
Hand stats store.
Private variable used by Hand.

name: Hand
description:
Create a new Blackjack Hand.
Uses WeakMap variables for privacy

name: constructor
description:
Constructs the object.
Sets initial states for _hand and _stats.

name: draw
description:
Draws a card to the hand
On each card draw, update score stats

name: clear
description: Sets the vars to the original state.

name: scoreTotal
description: Gets the total score.

name: scoreStats
description: Gets the statistics.

name: cards
description: Gets the cards.

return.description: Array of cards in the current hand

name: isBust
description: Determines if the hand is bust.

name: hasBlackjack
description: Determines if the hand has a blackjack.

return.description: True if has blackjack, False otherwise.

name: app/game/index.js
getWinner
description: Gets the winner.

return.description: true = win, false = lost, null = push

name: dealerDrawing
description:
Dealer AI.
Hit until score of 16 or soft 17.
Do not hit if the player is already bust
or the player has blackjack.

name: calculateWinPercentage
description:
Calculates the win percentage
given the win and round count.

name: app/index.js
app/utils/array.js
shuffleArray
description:
Randomize array element order in-place using
Durstenfeld (based on Fisher–Yates') algorithm.
http://stackoverflow.com/a/12646864/7627609
